text:
Wrong Turn is a 2003 horror film directed by Rob Schmidt and written by Alan B. McElroy. The film stars Desmond Harrington, Eliza Dushku, Emmanuelle Chriqui, Jeremy Sisto, Lindy Booth and Kevin Zegers. It had a $12.6 million budget and grossed $28.7 million. It is the first installment in a film series that has spawned two sequels and three prequels.
It is followed by Wrong Turn 2: Dead End (2007).
